thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Nuvasive Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.56

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nuvasive Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.56
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Nuvasive Inc:
* NUVASIVE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.44 TO $2.47
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.56 TO $1.59 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.56
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.46 * Q4 REVENUE $271.7 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.095 BILLION TO $1.105 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.56, REVENUE VIEW $272.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.37, REVENUE VIEW $1.09 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
